channel.title: NEED HELP PLEASE! [Shard - Creativescape]
channel.description: I need help with the spawning ban. I want to spawn money but it bans me. How could I fix this ?

item.title: NEED HELP PLEASE! [Shard - Creativescape]
item.dc:creator: @vV_Fant0m_Vv vV Fant0m Vv
item.description:
@vV_Fant0m_Vv wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:12, topic:450249”][quote author=vV Fant0m Vv link=topic=553145.msg4052944#msg4052944 date=1342682047]

he wants you item code like what your typing/ trying to spawn:

such as ::item 995

995 being the item code, also does it unban you if you restart the server?

I don’t see how typing ::pickup 995 100000000 would ban you ?
I can’t type anything more than 100M cash.
otherwise I get banned, but anything below works.
and no, restarting the server doesn’t change anything, i have to manually unban myself .
[/quote]

It sounds to me like you’re being detected as an Item Duplicator by the server. Change the item amount it checks for if this is the case.[/quote]

and what file would this be under ? lol

Read full topic

item.title: NEED HELP PLEASE! [Shard - Creativescape]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“vV Fant0m Vv, post:8, topic:450249”][quote author=Ambition Rsps link=topic=553145.msg4052942#msg4052942 date=1342681942]
he wants you item code like what your typing/ trying to spawn:

such as ::item 995

995 being the item code, also does it unban you if you restart the server?
[/quote]

I don’t see how typing ::pickup 995 100000000 would ban you ?
I can’t type anything more than 100M cash.
otherwise I get banned, but anything below works.
and no, restarting the server doesn’t change anything, i have to manually unban myself .[/quote]

It sounds to me like you’re being detected as an Item Duplicator by the server. Change the item amount it checks for if this is the case.

Read full topic

item.title: NEED HELP PLEASE! [Shard - Creativescape]
item.dc:creator: @Ambition_Rsps Ambition Rsps
item.description:
@Ambition_Rsps wrote:

Did you check to see if there are spawn restrictions? search for “duping” and see if you can find anything with that word in the servers files and see if you can find 995. because it may be set at a veriable such as

item 995, max spawn set no more then 100000000

Read full topic

item.title: NEED HELP PLEASE! [Shard - Creativescape]
item.dc:creator: @vV_Fant0m_Vv vV Fant0m Vv
item.description:
@vV_Fant0m_Vv wrote:

[quote=“Ambition Rsps, post:9, topic:450249”]check to see if there is a maximum amount aloud to be spawned at a time, if spawning money is your only spawning problem, make a command that gives you money.

this is the one I use:

if that does not work or your commands do not look like that, I will make you one that fits your command style, or if you know how, just again make a command that adds the item: 995 (money)
into your inventory.[/quote]

the command works fine, i have no problem with that.
its the fact that when i type the command for money, or any item over 100000000, it boots me out of the game and bans me.
I was looking in the log files and it said I was banned for ‘duping’
Any ideas now ?

Read full topic

item.title: NEED HELP PLEASE! [Shard - Creativescape]
item.dc:creator: @Ambition_Rsps Ambition Rsps
item.description:
@Ambition_Rsps wrote:

check to see if there is a maximum amount aloud to be spawned at a time, if spawning money is your only spawning problem, make a command that gives you money.

this is the one I use:

if that does not work or your commands do not look like that, I will make you one that fits your command style, or if you know how, just again make a command that adds the item: 995 (money)
into your inventory.

Read full topic

item.title: NEED HELP PLEASE! [Shard - Creativescape]
item.dc:creator: @Ambition_Rsps Ambition Rsps
item.description:
@Ambition_Rsps wrote:

did you check the spawn command to see if a player name was set instead of a player rights, because if its a pre made source it could have a name, that way if a person whose name does not match the one given it will auto ban for eco and safety reasons.

Read full topic
